author: Blade
title: Praise my statue
review:
Well I just counted and believe it or not this model has 20 pieces. I wouldn't have believed it either. It is just what you see, An Indian, A totem and some weapons.

The Totem is quite colourful and dose looks strangely odd but it is built from prime colours and shades but still not one of my favourite pieces.

The Indian is in standard Indian dress of all brown and tan. His facial paint also looks really cool. He is carrying a quiver of arrows, a bow and a spear which are all black. He also has a neat Indian shield.

Overall this set is definitely a promo and I have honestly got no idea how I came across it all the way over hear in Australia. This set is a good way to help build up your armoury for weapons or your tribe of Indians or totems for your village if you really want them. I feel this set is scraping a 5/10 only because it is, was and always will be a promo item.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Western - Indian Chief
review:
The Indian Chief (2845) is a LEGO Western set which came out in 1997. It comes with 1 minifig and 20 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/2845-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigures:

Indian Medicine Man: The indian medicine man comes with a brown haircut which have 2 beaks on it. His face does have some war paintings on it and the minifig does look serious. The indian has a nice shield and a black speer with a plume on it. He has a brown torso with some very detailed markings on it and his tan legs are printed. The indian also has a bow with a dart and a quiver.


Indian Chief:

The indian chief set was very easy to build. Well it kinda was too easy to put together. I'm sure you won't need longer than 3 minutes to build the totem pole. It looks very cool and it's very sturdy. In my opinion it's just an accessory to your LEGO Western collection. It's also a good army builder. But this set doesn't have any play features so the playability is a  little bit bounded by.



Ideas:

This set also comes with 2 ideas which you can build with the pieces of this set. There're no instructions for those models but you can build them from the pictures on my website.



Positive:

Great pieces which you can use for brickfilms or MOC's
Minifig
Ideas which you can build with the pieces of this set
Nice starter set
Nice army builder


Negative:

No play features
No stickers
Too easy to build




All in all this set is okay and I would recommend you to get this model. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
